name: Slvys21
wishText: I wish you an amazing year fullfilled with happyness ;)🎊🎉
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday to you !! Yeee ! I wish you a lot of success, happyness and so many good things blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do
text4: I realised I want to do something
outroText: Wow... Thanks to you to an amazing person. Wish this year will 1000 times be more amazing🫂✨.
